name: Dark SecondLife Marketplace (ONLY)
description: Do you feel your eyes burning while browsing the marketplace in the comfort of your dark room? Well, that won't be the case anymore because a dark version of the Second Life marketplace web pages is now available for you to use! With removed contents and added features for a much better browsing experience through hundreds of products! [ Version: 5 | View change logs ]

user.name: Hyokkuda
user.about: I am a hardcore gamer, completionist, creative & perfectionist. I like various anime in the style of Dragon Ball Z, Bleach & Sword Art Online. I love spicy food & vanilla stuff! Also I'm a web stylist. I started off on a community website called Gaia Online with CSS and CSS3 style language. I continued working on websites and designs and now here I am. I am trying to make a living on making websites and web styles like theses. I do not force anyone on donating, but it is most appreciated. ♥

additional_info: NOTICE: I was informed of a bug with the code layout on March 30, 2020 via Twitter. I will be working on that bug shortly. A version 2 of the Dark Second Life Marketplace is currently in progress. IMPORTANT: For bug reports, please use Twitter and send me a tweet or a direct message with the link of your issue after posting it in the discussions down below! I don't receive any notifications when somebody is using the Discussions/Feedback button. This style was first created for my personal preferences here but I took a few suggestions and improved a couple of things for the Marketplace only. If you already have my style called Dark Second Life installed to your browser, please disable it before browsing the marketplace. The style will be updated whenever possible with this new update integrated to it. Screenshots: Home Page | Product Scroll 1 | Product Scroll 2 | Review Page
